message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $9,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go below $9,200. I believe that's a fair price considering the value this product brings.
I appreciate your stance, Alice. I am willing to pay up to $9,100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
